to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.command

Class RotateCameraCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.command.AbstractCommand
      • to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.command.AbstractCommandWithOkResponse
        • to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.command.RotateCameraCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RotateCameraCommand
extends AbstractCommandWithOkResponse
    Implementation for sending RequestCommand.ROTATE_CAM. Processes a ResponseMessage.REQUEST_OK as response.
    Author:
    sven
